title: in so far as that section inserts sections 38E, 38G, 38J, 38K and 38L into the Act
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Health (Amendment) Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 

(Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) (no 2) order 2021

title: in so far as that section inserts sections 38E, 38G, 38J, 38K and 38L into the Act
heading: 2. The 22nd day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 7,
text_raw:
2. The 22nd day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which section 7, 
in so far as that section inserts sections 38E, 38G, 38J, 38K and 38L into the Act 
of 1947, of the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [124] 3

title: in so far as that section inserts sections 38E, 38G, 38J, 38K and 38L into the Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 22 March 2021 as the date on which those provisions of 
section 7 numbered sections 38E, 38G, 38J, 38K and 38L of the Health 
(Amendment) Act 2021 come into operation. Those provisions concern the 
designation of states (section 38E), the making of regulations (section 38G), the 
maintenance of records (38KJ), data protection (38J) and arrangements with 
other Ministers to carry out certain functions under the Act (38L).
